description: This Java source file defines the FileHelper utility class, which provides methods for loading resource files into strings or string buffers, performing macro substitutions, and filtering comments. It is part of a package related to I/O operations within the 'com.icontrol.generate.service.io' namespace.

classes.name: FileHelper
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to load resource files into strings or buffers, with support for macro substitution and comment filtering.

methods.name: loadTemplate
methods.description: Loads a resource file from the classpath into a StringBuffer, skipping lines that start with '##'.

methods.name: translateBuffer
methods.description: Performs macro substitution on the given StringBuffer using a MacroSource object.

methods.name: translateSimpleBuffer
methods.description: Loads a template file and performs a single key/value macro substitution.

methods.name: translateBufferTemplate
methods.description: Loads a template file and performs macro substitution using provided macros.
